statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine yeast and sugar with 2 cups of warm 105 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are boiling water that is 220 째F and ice that is 32 째F.
How much boiling water and ice should you mix together to get 2 cups of 105 째F water?

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
